name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 19, opposite the Russian Consulate in Shanghai, someone used flowers to mourn Navalny. On the paper was written Navalny's famous quote: "I am not afraid, and you should not be afraid either."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A B station UP host quoted an article titled "Let the wisdom of ancient civilizations illuminate the future" when satirizing the "Western pseudo-history theory" that has been extremely popular in China in recent years, which triggered a large number of pseudo-history enthusiasts to criticize and complain about the article.
In the end, the UP host said that the author of the article was Xi Jinping.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 19, a netizen exposed on Douyin that he had booked a four-person room in Harbin Xuexiang for 4,900 yuan a night:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens contributed that there is a camera every few meters along the road in Tianjin Huayuan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 19, in Gulou District, Fuzhou, Fujian, the delivery man’s vehicle was locked by a nearby urban management staff. After an argument, the delivery man lay down on the sidewalk in anger. The driver of a passing car did not notice the pedestrians on the ground and ran over them. Witnesses said that everyone worked together to lift the car to rescue the injured person who was run over, and he was later sent to the hospital for treatment by medical staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 20, Chinese figure skating male athlete Liu Xinyu exposed his misconduct on his Instagram account, including "bribing referees" and "raping minors", which sparked heated discussions among netizens.
The Jilin Provincial Sports Bureau responded that the relevant content was being verified, and afterwards, the account had been set to a private account.
On the same day, his partner Wang Shiyue posted on Weibo that Liu Xinyu's overseas social media account had been maliciously hacked and the police had been notified.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a former Pinduoduo employee revealed on Maimai that in order to prevent employees from leaving to join competing companies, Pinduoduo monitors the whereabouts of employees by tracking, secretly filming videos, or requiring resigned employees to provide social security payment certificates every month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Similar graffiti appears again on the streets of Xi'an

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the well-known Maoist information website "Mao Zedong Expo" was notified by the authorities' "relevant departments" that its content was "not suitable for dissemination" and was required to be closed in the near future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 20, Zhumadian Senior High School in Henan Province was forced to reopen during the recent snowstorm. To avoid being discovered, the school set up a cordon inside the school to prevent students from entering the surveillance area and being photographed (the surveillance is connected to the Provincial Department of Education).
